Uses of Class
io.atomix.protocols.raft.storage.snapshot.SnapshotWriter

  • Packages that use SnapshotWriter 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.protocols.raft.service
    Provides classes for managing Raft-based primitive services.
    io.atomix.protocols.raft.storage.snapshot
    Provides classes and interfaces that aid in storing, loading, and installing on-disk state machine snapshots.

    • Uses of SnapshotWriter in io.atomix.protocols.raft.service

      Methods in io.atomix.protocols.raft.service with parameters of type SnapshotWriter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RaftServiceContext.takeSnapshot(SnapshotWriter writer)
      Takes a snapshot of the service state.
